Text:
I am not sure how to EDIT a torrent. I forgot to add the album list, so here are the albums included in this torrent. Hope you all enjoy		

1978 Atlantic Starr
1979 Straight To The Point
1981 Radiant
1982 Brilliance
1983 Your Forever
1985 As The Band Turns
1986 Secret Lovers

1989 We're Moving Up
1991 Love Crazy
1994 Time
1999 Legacy
